Text: Whoa, you don't know how long I've been searching for these, thanks a lot!

I just remembered that i converted some of the season 3 second half episodes too, if anybody cares.  Episodes 14, 15, 18 and 19 were .ogm files.  I think they were XviD; I just repacked them in .avi and recoded the audio to mp3.  Episode 22 was an .mp4 file; I think I recoded that one.  And episode 16 was an ASF file.
Thanks for your efforts in putting this together and sharing it with us
